doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 47 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/18/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 47 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/18/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Coverage of David Summers' death, with clipsCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey2. Anita Bryant's anti-gay history discussed3. ACLU votes to endorse the legalization of same-sex marriages4. Ohio's Cuyahoga County Board of Commissioners bans job discrimination based on sexual orientation5. Andy Humm on the Catholic Church's promotion of violence against homosexualsCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine6. Certain PBS stations decline to air documentary, "The AIDS Show," on the invisible effects of AIDS7. Telephone poll in San Francisco shows the effects of AIDS on the gay community8. California passes new law regulating the sale of "poppers" recreational drug9. White House Drug Advisor finds that heavy marijuana use can make people gayCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp10. Sports Report11. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine2. "Just Ask Raz" advice segmentCOMMERCIAL: The Monster3. Clips from AIDS discussion on the People's Court4. Interview with director, Rosa von Praunheim, regarding his film "A Virus Knows no Morals"COMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation5. Second part of interview with calendar model, Andre FisetCOMMERCIAL: Paint-on tattoo kitCOMMERCIAL: PFLAG condomsCOMMERCIAL: GCN pledge drive, with Jack Wrangler
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 47 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 11/18/1986]: November 1986
